body: this is the moment ive been waiting for i have always wanted this one comic to be colorized and finally that day has come

Hey, if the older content is good and worth it, like this one, then it's totally fine, no problem. I've seen other colorized works done by others one shra wtaru's naruto works, I like the colors in this one, not too pastel or bright/dry, usually for some reason, specially if there are characters with pink hair, it gets very pastel-ish and far off from the original color scheme.
or at least use incomplete tag...

Don't get me wrong, I love your work. But no one likes it when you upload incomplete stuff.
Also, how about making new stuff instead of colourising older content? Just a suggestion.
This isn't the whole comic. Going for quick favs hmm??
Upload the finished work, or don't upload it
